com.lift.game.view.actors.polygon_actor

Class BasePolyActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.lift.game.view.actors.polygon_actor.BasePolyActor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiamondPoly, OctagonPoly

    public abstract class BasePolyActor
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
    Used to draw polygons on the screen.
